bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration, from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for the training of its professional staff.
